revision.text:
{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #404040; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#{{Dungeons color dark}}; color:#FFF;"|{{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;background-color:#FFF;" {{!}}{{{image}}}
{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{tokens|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Tokens needed''' {{!}}{{{tokens}}} {{Dungeontokens}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#{{Dungeons color light}}; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Location''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }} |} == Code == 
{{Infobox Dungeon
|name    =
|image   =
|caption =
|tokens  =
|location =
}}
== Usage == To use this template, place the code above at the top of an article and fill in the respective blanks. '''Where:''' *name should be filled with the name of the dungeon. *image should be filled with the background image of the dungeon (from the screen before you start the dungeon). *caption should be filled with a description of the image spot. *tokens should be filled with the number of dungeon tokens needed to enter the dungeon. *location should be filled with the general location of the dungeon; i.e., Viridian Forest is north of Viridian City on Route 2.
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
